description:
This mods contains 19 awesome cannons with shooting animations and custom projectiles.

[code][h1][b]This mod contains:[/b][/h1]
- Tank cannon
- Flak cannon
- Naval cannon
- 2nd tank cannon
- M1 Abrams cannon
- Schwerer Gustav cannon (mortar)
- Aircraft cannon
- 2nd naval cannon
- 3rd tank cannon
- Railgun
- 2nd railgun (has better effects and it's more powerful)
- M109 cannon (howitzer)
- Rocket launcher
- Smart cannon (works with the number logic from 'The Modpack')
- Small smart cannon
- Orbital cannon
- Smart rocket launcher (you can use The Modpack to input some stuff)
- Flare (heat decoy) launcher
- EMP Cannon (disconnects logic)
- Smart Rocket Detector
- Shell Ejector
- Laser Cannon[/code]

[code][h1][b]Language support:[/b][/h1]
- English: by default
- Russian: by default
- German: by default
- Polish: Thanks to Driver for the translation![/code]

[code][h1][b]Contributors:[/b][/h1]
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198361178618]Questionable Mark[/url][/b] - creator of all the textures, UV maps for models, scripts and a behaviour of the projectiles
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198134257237]Gratiskatze[/url][/b] - creator of the most cannons, creator of the logo, beta-tester and German language translator.
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198296305997]Brent Batch[/url][/b] - creator of the most scripts and creator of the Global Script.
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198350208505]Kein Anderer[/url][/b] - beta-tester and German language translator.
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198280635682]Driver[/url][/b] - creator of an EMP Cannon model and Polish language translator.
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198196145217]Seemomster[/url][/b] - creator of the 2nd Tank Cannon.[/code]

If you want to support us and you like this mod you can leave your thumbs up on this mod and add it to your favorites.
name: Cannons Pack
